title: Social Media AI Video Creator
job_overview:
We are seeking a few experienced youtube / tiktok video creators who can produce creative videos by using AI tools. This is a long term job position. Look for talented individuals who have big growth potential. 

To apply, please fill out the Google form below. Note: We will not be responding to messages on online job platforms.
